item.description:
Hello wine lovers,
Our first meeting is scheduled for Thursday, Oct 4 from 7-9pm at Mikes house.
Thanks to those offering appetizers. I'll email you separately.

We'll discuss The American Wine Society, wine tastings and how our chapter could function. Our American Wine Society guest speaker talks about his experience with AWS and his chapter.

Agenda
o Introductions
o American Wine Society and Chapters
o Sam Streiff - American Wine Society Treasurer
o Wine Taste / appetizers / socialize
o Reconvene / discuss / decide
o Discussions:
Where/ When / How / Costs

Mission: Enhance appreciation of fine wines through discussion, tastings and other activities.
item.name: Startup meeting !
